lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.loan_because: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I'm impressed how well and NGO is linking donors with the projects and making use of the Web. It's one of those things you really wish that you'd thought of yourself. I also like that you can take the money back, not that I'm about to, but it's a refreshing attitude.
lender.occupational_info: I teach

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I look at the eyes in the pictures and know that these loans are the most exciting thing I've done in a long time: a thank you for living in this good world and an investment in us, together.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I realize that I am lucky, and want to share. It's special to connect with people around the world. And, I admire people who operate small businesses!
lender.occupational_info: I pay the bills for small businesses, and I take care of the gardens of people who don't have time to do it!

lender.name: Andres
lender.loan_because: I have always felt the urge to help out others who don't have the same opportunities as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of the group Chair the Wealth, which I co-created with David Hyman at The Calhoun School, along with Middle School students. As I write this I think of how I want to continue being part of this group even when I don't work at this school. I hope we can keep sharing the wealth for many years to come.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I Like To See The Ambitous Less Fortunate Succeed To A Better Life

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need because everyone deserves a happy life. I also like reading and learning about everyones jobs they started and how interesting they are.
lender.occupational_info: I am happy to help these people because I want them to live happy lives in their countries. If they want to know more about me, I love to watch football and gymnastics, I like sushi, and I do many sports such as soccer, skating, swimming, track, and tennis. I also love going to camp in the summer!

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: I try to be an eco-citizen in my everyday life. And when I created my little company, I did it in a corporate social responsibility philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: I’m an artist and co-founder of Frogames in which I’m an independent game developer.

lender.name: Lucrezia
lender.loan_because: Loaning and giving is a way to express gratitude to Spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a painter and a sculptor. I sell my art at craft fairs and private sales.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I love helping people to have a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I move books along from the manuscript stage to the printed page.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I love helping people who want to get ahead.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can, therefore I should.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: When I was widowed, my family, friends and the State looked after me. Many widows are not so fortunate. I would like even up the balance a little.

lender.name: Curtis & Stacy
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I put music and sound into video games.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children under the age of 5.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: nothing feels more right than helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I loan for two reasons. The first is because I want to be part of the solution for the many less fortunate people in our world. The second reason is that I'm selfish. You see, it gives me such a wonderful feeling to page through the Kiva site and see all the people, from many different countries, and cultures, who come together to help others. I wish everyone had a Kiva Account. It would change their view of what you have to have, what you can't live without.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I was the assistant to the grocery buyer at a major grocery chain. I managed my bosses appointments and researched customer problems that could not be resolved at the store level. I was also responsible for checking and pricing the weekly add.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I see myself in other people and in my travels people have been kind to me.
lender.occupational_info: I own and work in a coffee shop

lender.name: maureen
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care. It is probably the main reason why all people here are lending. Hopefully once I have finished my studies I will be able to have the time and energy to do more.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am studying graphic design in the University of Ulster. I am in my final year so fingers crossed I get a good grade! I am an U.S. American Expat living in the U.K. right now and have plans to move to Norway with my husband next year after I finish my final year. I love to draw, paint and have a passion for life.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Esteban
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to help with development.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Wall Street. I have lived in London, Mexico, France, New York and China. I am also a volunteer Spanish-English translator for Kiva.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: I believe everybody should be given a chance.

lender.name: Lane
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others in their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that documents are accurate and legally ethnical and compliant so that shareholders can understand and use them to plan for their retirement and financial planning.

lender.name: Tia
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people improve their lives and fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that clients of the company I work for are taken well care of and are happy with the services we provide. I work for a corporate travel company.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Providing opportunities for kids to be active and healthy.

lender.name: Rotaract Club Toronto
lender.loan_because: We are an international organization of young people between the ages of 18 to 30, sponsored by Rotary International. Our club is based in Toronto, Canada, and we think microcredit is a great way to reduce poverty.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to have a better life.

lender.name: Dave McMurtry
lender.loan_because:
I believe in Job Creation as a more effective form of aid than handouts.
See my video about Kiva in Liberia here: http://fellowsblog.kiva.org/2010/03/11/12745/
lender.occupational_info: I build internet businesses (like Kiva!) here in San Francisco, Ca.

lender.name: Jutta
lender.loan_because: The little extra money in our wallets goes a long way for those who need the loan - let's put it to work!

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to support anyone who believes they can make a difference within their community. What I have is only given to me through Christ and I know He wants me to give freely as well.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying at university to become a teacher and work at a coffee shop the remainder of the week.

lender.name: Palladium Hall - NYU
lender.loan_because: Because it makes a difference. Because it's important. Because it's the right thing to do. Because we can!!
lender.occupational_info: We are students and staff at New York University, in New York City, U.S.A. We all live together in a huge apartment building called "Palladium Residence Hall". We are neighbors and friends of each other.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Iwant to help other people
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired but I breed sheep,and grow pumpkins etc .for sale.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: I help other business men do their jobs better by giving them new ideas and my management expertise

lender.name: Yokimato
lender.loan_because: I'm embedded with a deep sense of responsibility to do what I can for those less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I provide goods to the world through a complex network of connections

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I should do at least one thing useful with my life.
lender.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lender.name: JCSz
lender.occupational_info: I study biology at university

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I want to support other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can :-)
lender.occupational_info: International Flight Attendant

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I received a KIVA gift certificate as a gift and feel good about re-lending the money to help others who need it!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can and because I love this kiva microlending concept!
lender.occupational_info: I am a machine stenographer who makes an impartial verbatim record of legal proceedings and public hearings

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: It is a way for small investors to become involved with people and projects all over the world. It also appears that our small contributions can make a difference in someone's future
lender.occupational_info: I manage a staff of approximate forty individuals for a very high quality specialty grocery and gift store. I direct the gift department and cooking school for the organization.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Why Shouldn't I?

lender.name: Arwen Taylor
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone is the creator of their own reality and love to help people attain their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional writer, thinker, info junkie and entrepreneur. I believe everyone is the creator of their own reality and love to help people attain their goals. I am the founder and owner of Omnithinker Media, a collection of websites dedicated to providing information and tools people can use to create the life they want.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I aim to help the world.
lender.occupational_info: Love school!

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Automating pharmaceutical plants.

lender.name: colton
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to support the empowerment of women and children. I want to spread love and security and erradicate suffering.
lender.occupational_info: I represent children who are victims of abuse and neglect. I also am learning how to bring about peaceful resolutions to people's conflicts as a mediator.

lender.name: eddie III
lender.loan_because: ya gotta give!
lender.occupational_info: fortunate.

lender.name: Jaime Lyn
lender.occupation: Mother of niece and great nephew
lender.loan_because: We all need help!
lender.occupational_info: I am raising my niece and great nephew. They are the sun shine in my life.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I can, therefore I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It's fun, informative, and the right thing to do.

lender.name: Kreeson
lender.loan_because: i want to help those who need it most
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank developing software that helps borrowers and lenders transact. This site does a similar thing except it helps lenders who don't have access to capital. I like that this organization fills this urgent need.

lender.name: Seinberg
lender.loan_because: As with most: I'm fortunate enough to be able, so I'm happy to contribute to a cause that does more than just donate, but helps build infrastructure and business in developing areas.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Science graduate student and a programmer for a medical software company. I basically make software for nursing homes.

lender.name: Robbin
lender.loan_because: I have much compaired to so many. my mother died and left me with her house. my brother & I sold it and split the money. I want my sons to live a life filled with gratitude and the willingness to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my boys. one of whom is autistic.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle financially. Many of my relatives, including mom, are private business owners. Private/small businesses allow for money to flow between people who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: I spend much of my free time helping out at church. I'm on the Social Concerns comittee (where I learned of Kiva) and volunteer helping with the youth.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: we have so much....
lender.occupational_info: communication is the key to success

lender.name: Jim Paolo
lender.loan_because: I come from a third world country and am lucky enough to have been able to get out and earn a decent living. I think it's my turn to pass that luck on.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a public relations agency and I handle all the editorial requirements of the agency's clients. I write press releases and speeches for top-level execs.

lender.name: Beta Lambda
lender.loan_because: We are caring amibitous ladies who love to support others with ranging aspirations and dreams!

lender.name: Delta Sigma Pi-Xi Pi
lender.loan_because: We are students of Business, Economics, Accounting, and International Relations who support others with similar interests and entrepreneurIal goals!

lender.name: Camiel and Eva
lender.loan_because: small things too, can make a big difference!

lender.name: Aldred
lender.loan_because: I want to start a Business Labour Outsourcing. I have one Partner, Selvin Kok, and we want to start a Labour Outsourcing Business.
lender.occupational_info: We will do all Recruitments for Companies. People will submit their CV's to our Company and we will do job placement were their skeels is required

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: everybody must be able to accomplish his plans and work as he wishes it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach for children who are between eight and eleven year's old in a small school in France.

lender.name: Luisa
lender.loan_because: I feel very special to be able to support someone's dream. I believe a little help can go a long way!

lender.name: Björn
lender.loan_because: I wish to support local companies, particularly those dealing in knowledge or locally produced goods.
lender.occupational_info: Located in Sweden, I help companies sell more products and reaching more customers using the Internet

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can! My life is full of blessings and I am grateful for every single moment that I don't have to think about where my next meal or paycheck is coming from.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7 and 8 years olds at the International School of Dhaka, Bangladesh. I teach them maths, language, science, social science, health, art and physical education. I love my work!

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I want to support micro businesses and give people the chance to build up a self dependent living.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manager in the field of Corporate Finance & Accounting

lender.name: Noemia
lender.loan_because: Para ampliar minha loja e fazer um capital de giro, tenho muita procura mais, falta ainda muita mercadoria.
lender.occupational_info: loja de roupas para adultos, gestantes, adolecentes e crianças, vendas com crediário proprio e cartões de créditos

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: many people couldn't care less. I do.
lender.occupational_info: I help teach people how to decide what's right and good in life.

lender.name: Becki
lender.loan_because: My son and family gave me a gift certificate.

lender.name: Christine

lender.loan_because: My students and I want to help.

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: A great Idea to leverage a new type of global worlwide thinking of economy
lender.occupational_info: Managing new technologies and new customer approach in a big wwide company

lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. National Park Service

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I would like to assist those trying to make a better life. Especially with agriculture, even better with rabbits!
lender.occupational_info: Liason between small business employers and government agencies in regards to payroll taxes.

lender.name: HOUSSAM
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are putting real effort on improving their life.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies communicate with their customers on a one-to-one basis and to know what , when and how to talk to them.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I'd like to work in this sector further : so, I'm testing solutions
lender.occupational_info: I try to find global solution for big and medium companies, mainly in financing short term (treasury) and medium/long term (investment) needs

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a contribution to their world

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance. It's our responsibility to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the computer systems of a company that provides services and products to schools and churches.

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: there is nothing better than helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: My research empowers people to connect to each other

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: People need to be connected to each other in meaningful ways. Loans are a good way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I travel with school and church groups around the US and the world. I set up trips and help them raise money.

lender.name: Rulen
lender.loan_because: I like to support entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I manage project to help businesses with technology solutions

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: CTHS/Profe
lender.loan_because: High school students who believe in micro loans as a way to mitigate poverty in the developing world. We activly paticipate in CHANGE.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do for our fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: I work with preschool-age children of migrant farm workers to help them reach kindergarten readiness. I love my job.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like not to have money.
lender.occupational_info: I don't have a job!

lender.name: Guido
lender.loan_because: - it helps! - it makes sense! - it sets the right incentive! - and yes, it makes me feel good too.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: I would like people in other parts of the world enjoy the same opportunities our local bank grants us.
lender.occupational_info: I help my husband run our small dairy farm in that I rear the calves, plan our breeding policy and look after the ever increasing paperwork.

lender.name: Jep
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving entrapenuers a hand-up, and not a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I sell trace detection products for Narcotics & Explosives, as well as X-ray Screening & Metalk Detection equipment. My products are generally used at border checkpoints, bridges & tunnels, and access control points in court houses & prisons.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God financially and wish to share some of it with those who need the money.
lender.occupational_info: As Food Services Manager at a Christian kids camp, I am in charge of the day-to-day runnings of the kitchen and dish room. Between ordering food, writing schedules and cooking work keeps me busy. In July and August we are feeding approximately 650 people three times a day. The rest of the year is a little slower, but we never actually close down. From September to April we are feeding a Bible college group who lives on the property. I love my job and the people God brings to work with me.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I believe in your dream.
lender.occupational_info: I study plants and work to restore and improve water quality and ecosystem functions.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: God has given me more than I need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy to university students. I try to help my students recognize how blessed they are so they can learn to live with a hand extended to others less fortunate.

lender.name: kaiman
lender.loan_because: Yes we can

lender.name: John Patrick
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small dairy farm with the help of my wife.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to be a pharmacist in hopes that I can help those people who do not have the access to or the money for doctors.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I love to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, learn stuff, take tests then start all over again.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the inherent goodness and earnestness of people...that giving a hand-up rather than a hand-out adds to others' dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Teach Human Anatomy & Physiology and Bioethics.

lender.name: INSE
lender.loan_because: INSE members believe it's important to help the largest number of micro-entrepreneurs across the globe.
lender.occupational_info:
The International Network of Social-Eco Entrepreneurs inspires its members to work in line with the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs). Our top priorities are: - eradication of extreme poverty - increased protection of the planet - providing a better education to the largest possible number of people across the globe.
We are contributing to making the world a better place, now and for generations to come.

lender.name: colleen
lender.loan_because: i love meeting people from other parts of the world and learning about what they do. I love being able to help someone start their own business and make a good living!
lender.occupational_info: I teach mostly children but some adults about their environment and how to live in a sustainable, healthy , respectful way on this planet so that we will have a healthy planet for generations to come!

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I am a soldier in the United States Army

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: ...many people have helped me in life

lender.occupational_info: Wearing many hats for many different companies :-)

lender.name: David & Terrie

lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with more than I deserve...

lender.name: Joann

lender.occupational_info: I lead the strategy and implementation of three major programs of a small non-profit that does international development focused on helping children achieve their potential through grassroots partnerships with organizations around the world.

lender.occupational_info: There are many delicacies of Baguio City ,making jams is one of Baguio's specialty. I started making jams and candies since last year . I love making desserts , it is my forte, When I was still studying culinary I always excel in dessert making . our products are Fruit jams like strawberry, kiwi ,pineapple, yum, Apple , pear etc . and candies like pastillas de leche , polvoron, yema (custard candy) homemade marshmallow , and fruit jellies.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I loan to empower
lender.occupational_info: The Bliss Women and Children Project is a Christian nonprofit Organization whose main focus is to spread the love of Christ and hope to poor women and children , displaced ,widows destitute, abandoned and those who face the challenge of HIV/AIDS epidemic. We deal primarily with women and children. We offer aid and help with basics ie food and clothing among other needful in life is education .For women ,We train them on small scale businesses.and then offer micro finance to enable them start earning, The centre has a few projects already in progress eg baking, weaving.& knitting, The Center was founded under the leadership of Esther Githaiga and have granted a good relationship with the families we work with:- SUBSCRIBE TO BWCP
